messages.content: pfg-ComfyUI is a custom node for ComfyUI that integrates the functionality of the pfg-webui tool.
Where should the pfg-ComfyUI repository be cloned?
The pfg-ComfyUI repository should be cloned in the 'ComfyUI/custom_nodes' directory.
From where can the pfg model be obtained?
The pfg model can be obtained from https://huggingface.co/furusu/PFG and should be placed in the 'pfg-ComfyUI/models' directory.
How can the pfg node be opened in ComfyUI?
The pfg node can be opened from the 'loaders' section in ComfyUI.
What should be connected to the pfg node in ComfyUI?
The 'CONDITIONING' output from the Prompt node should be connected to the Sampler input of the pfg node.
Is there a visual representation of how to set up pfg-ComfyUI?
Yes, an image named 'comfy-pfg' is provided in the repository, showing the setup of pfg-ComfyUI.
Is pfg-ComfyUI based on any existing tool or repository?
Yes, pfg-ComfyUI is based on the pfg-webui tool available at https://github.com/laksjdjf/pfg-webui.
